thread.title: Last chance to ride Disaster! at Universal Orlando
thread.title_full: Last chance to ride Disaster! at Universal Orlando

author: Dewayne Bevil
title: Last chance to ride Disaster! at Universal Orlando
text:
Last chance to ride Disaster! at Universal Orlando Disaster! Joe Burbank / Orlando Sentinel 
The Wilkowski family of Honolulu, Hawaii, joins Universal Orlando president Bill Davis on the stage to launch the pyrotechnic debut of the new Disaster! attraction at Universal Studios Florida, Thursday, Jan. 17, 2008. Disaster! is an interactive movie-making ride that replaces the Earthquake attraction. It's closing Sept. 8, 2015 to make way for a Fast & Furious-themed ride. 
The Wilkowski family of Honolulu, Hawaii, joins Universal Orlando president Bill Davis on the stage to launch the pyrotechnic debut of the new Disaster! attraction at Universal Studios Florida, Thursday, Jan. 17, 2008. Disaster! is an interactive movie-making ride that replaces the Earthquake attraction. It's closing Sept. 8, 2015 to make way for a Fast & Furious-themed ride. (Joe Burbank / Orlando Sentinel)
